hints.content:
We can think of $\purpleC{707}$ as $\purpleC{7\text{ hundreds}}$ and $\purpleC{7 \text{ ones}}$.  

We can think of $\blueD{253}$ as $\blueD{2\text{ hundreds}}$, $\blueD{5\text{ tens}}$, and $\blueD{3\text{ ones}}$.

$\phantom{=}\purpleC{707}+\blueD{253}$

$=\purpleC{7\text{ hundreds}}+\purpleC{7\text{ ones}}+\blueD{2\text{ hundreds}}+\blueD{5\text{ tens}}+\blueD{3\text{ ones}}$

$= \purpleC{7\text{ hundreds}}+\blueD{2\text{ hundreds}}+\blueD{5\text{ tens}}+\purpleC{7\text{ ones}}+\blueD{3\text{ ones}}$
The answer: $7\text{ hundreds} + 2\text{ hundreds} +5 \text{ tens}+7\text{ ones} +3 \text{ ones}$

choices.content: $7\text{ hundreds} + 0\text{ hundreds} +7 \text{ tens}+2\text{ tens} +5 \text{ ones}+3 \text{ ones}$

question.content:
**Which expression could be used to find the value of $707+253$?**
